entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 10.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 28. Forecast issued 07:18 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning late in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 27. Forecast issued 07:18 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
